entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 March 2023
